sourcesContent:
<script>
/**
 * Task Status Chart Component
 * 
 * Doughnut chart displaying the distribution of tasks by status
 * Shows breakdown of: To Do, In Progress, and Done tasks
 * 
 * Props:
 * - tasks: Array of task objects, each with a 'status' property
 * 
 * Features:
 * - Reactive updates when tasks array changes
 * - Pastel color scheme matching claymorphism design
 * - Responsive sizing
 * - Bottom legend with circular point style
 * - Styled tooltips with pastel background
 * 
 * Data Flow:
 * 1. Receives tasks array as prop from parent (Dashboard.vue)
 * 2. Computes chartData by counting tasks per status
 * 3. Watcher detects changes to tasks array
 * 4. Re-renders chart with updated data
 */

import { Doughnut } from 'vue-chartjs'

export default {
  name: 'TaskStatusChart',
  extends: Doughnut,  // Inherit from vue-chartjs Doughnut component
  
  /**
   * Props
   */
  props: {
    /**
     * Array of task objects to display
     * Each task should have a 'status' property: 'To Do', 'In Progress', or 'Done'
     * @type {Array}
     * @default []
     */
    tasks: {
      type: Array,
      default: () => []
    }
  },
  
  /**
   * Lifecycle hook - called after component is mounted to DOM
   * Renders the chart with current data and options
   */
  mounted() {
    this.renderChart(this.chartData, this.chartOptions)
  },
  
  computed: {
    /**
     * Generate chart data object for Chart.js
     * Counts tasks by status and formats for doughnut chart display
     * 
     * @returns {Object} Chart.js formatted data object with labels and datasets
     */
    chartData() {
      // Initialize status counter object
      const statusCounts = {
        'To Do': 0,
        'In Progress': 0,
        'Done': 0
      }

      // Count tasks in each status
      this.tasks.forEach(task => {
        if (statusCounts[task.status] !== undefined) {
          statusCounts[task.status]++
        }
      })

      // Return Chart.js compatible data structure
      return {
        // Doughnut labels appear in legend
        labels: ['To Do', 'In Progress', 'Done'],
        datasets: [
          {
            label: 'Tasks by Status',
            // Data values correspond to labels in same order
            data: [
              statusCounts['To Do'],
              statusCounts['In Progress'],
              statusCounts['Done']
            ],
            // Pastel colors from claymorphism design system
            backgroundColor: [
              'rgba(255, 209, 220, 0.8)', // Pastel pink for To Do
              'rgba(255, 229, 212, 0.8)', // Pastel peach for In Progress
              'rgba(193, 240, 220, 0.8)'  // Pastel mint for Done
            ],
            // Solid border colors (no transparency)
            borderColor: [
              'rgba(255, 209, 220, 1)',
              'rgba(255, 229, 212, 1)',
              'rgba(193, 240, 220, 1)'
            ],
            borderWidth: 2  // Border thickness
          }
        ]
      }
    },
    
    /**
     * Chart.js options for styling and behavior
     * Configures layout, legend position, tooltips, and interactivity
     * 
     * @returns {Object} Chart.js options object
     */
    chartOptions() {
      return {
        responsive: true,        // Scale to fit container
        maintainAspectRatio: false, // Allow custom height
        layout: {
          padding: {
            top: 10,
            bottom: 10,
            left: 10,
            right: 10
          }
        },
        plugins: {
          legend: {
            position: 'bottom',   // Place legend below chart
            align: 'center',
            labels: {
              padding: 15,        // Space between legend items
              font: {
                size: 12,
                family: "'Segoe UI', Tahoma, Geneva, Verdana, sans-serif"
              },
              usePointStyle: true, // Use circles instead of rectangles
              pointStyle: 'circle'
            }
          },
          // Tooltip styling on hover
          tooltip: {
            backgroundColor: 'rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.9)',
            titleColor: '#333',
            bodyColor: '#666',
            borderColor: '#D4C5F9',  // Claymorphism accent color
            borderWidth: 1,
            padding: 12,
            cornerRadius: 8,
            titleFont: {
              size: 14,
              weight: 'bold'
            },
            bodyFont: {
              size: 13
            }
          }
        },
        cutout: '60%'  // Inner circle size (makes it doughnut instead of pie)
      }
    }
  },
  
  /**
   * Watchers - detect changes to reactive data
   */
  watch: {
    /**
     * Watch tasks array for changes
     * When tasks change, re-render the chart with new data
     * deep: true ensures nested property changes are detected
     */
    tasks: {
      deep: true,
      handler() {
        // Trigger chart re-render with updated data
      }
    }
  }
}
</script>
<style scoped>
/* Ensure chart canvas doesn't overflow container */
</style>
